Key Match Events: India beat Bangladesh by 133 runs in Hyderabad
Sanju Samson scored the second-fastest hundred by an Indian in T20Is
Pre-Game Insights: Gautam Gambhir's message to the Indian team before the series: 'no one is bigger than the team'
Post-Match Reflections: Suryakumar Yadav praised Sanju Samson for playing a selfless knock
Miscellaneous Highlights: Suryakumar Yadav became the second-fastest Indian to the landmark of 2500 T20I runs
Others: Ravi Bishnoi was the pick of the bowlers for India with figures of 4-1-30-3
Mayank Yadav also impressed with two wickets to his name
